Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering it to you for $100, reflecting its high standards and the opportunity to own something exclusive. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer
